sentences.english: Located in central Gansu Province, Dingxi City West, is the southern gate of the provincial capital Lanzhou.
sentences.chinese: 位於甘肅省中部，定西市西部，是省會蘭州的南大門。

sentences.english: It can be planted in semi-arid mountainous area of Dingxi City and the similar area.
sentences.chinese: 適宜在定西市半乾旱山區及其同類地區推廣種植。

sentences.english: The climate resource of the Dingxi area during the past 50 years are investigated.
sentences.chinese: 對定西市近50年的氣候資源進行分析。

sentences.english: Decide the loess plateau modes of life and relation to their environment that the area has different kind on the west weak environment.
sentences.chinese: 定西地區具有不同類型的黃土高原生態脆弱環境。
